description:
Immersive mode drawing and triggering improvements

* Don't draw the colored bars for favicons. This makes the bar less visually
  noisy.
* Lighten the bars slightly because they are much smaller areas than the tabs;
  this makes them visually match better.
* Only trigger reveal when the mouse stops moving, which matches the Ash
  auto-hidden launcher behavior and feels more natural.

BUG=166926,166927
TEST=manual


Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=174072
